Name: The Sob Island
About the game: Aidan wakes up in his former home, and what happens afterwards will completely subvert his perception of the world. Explore the confusing past and mysteriously disappearing family members until you end this endless nightmare, discover the truth behind your slumber, and finally face this fragmented world. 　　The Sob Island is a 2D plot puzzle game about the mysterious death of Aidan's mother on his 13th birthday, which is like the first domiro domino that fell, changing everything he knows. After waking up after a long dream treatment, he returns to the home where he once lived, the cause of his mother's death, the traces of his sister, his father's secret... All this doubt, Aidan gradually unveiled the real veil of the world -JediTown does not exist, the real name here is 'The Sob Island'. 　　The Sob Island is a 2D story puzzle game. The game contains a variety of decryption elements, as well as intellectual decryption, plot clues hidden in props, multiple scenes welcome everyone to explore.
